task.title: Tasks from TASKS_2026_01_16.md - Cloud deployment, workspace namespacing, and quick wins

events.content: Workspace-namespaced paths for socket and outbox: Workspace-namespaced paths for socket and outbox

raw.question: Workspace-namespaced paths for socket and outbox
raw.chosen: Workspace-namespaced paths for socket and outbox
raw.reasoning: Multi-tenant cloud isolation: when WORKSPACE_ID is set, use /tmp/relay/{workspaceId}/sockets/{name}.sock instead of /tmp/relay-pty-{name}.sock. Fallback to legacy paths for local dev.

retrospective.summary: Implemented WORKSPACE_ID env propagation (agent-relay-505) plus socket/outbox path namespacing (agent-relay-488, 489). PR #210 ready for review.
